attributes.action: Stabilising and then reducing the population
attributes.additional_details: Measures should be taken to both limit immigration and reduce the birth rate.  Immigration should be greatly reduced  and dependents of immigrant workers should  be banned .  Child allowance paid for only two children per family.  Fathers with more than two children should  pay extra taxes to pay for the extra resources needed.  Single mothers under 18 years of age should have the children put up for adoption.
